objects.text:
• Premium canvas upper construction
• Iconic star logo design
• Cushioned insole for all-day comfort
• Brown gum rubber outsole

product_details.name: Comet Classic Canvas Sneakers - Urban Comfort Meets Retro Style
product_details.description:
• Premium canvas upper construction for durability and breathability
• Iconic star logo design on sides for distinctive branding
• Brown gum rubber outsole providing excellent grip and traction
• Cream/off-white colorway perfect for versatile styling
• Cushioned insole for all-day comfort
• Brown leather accents and laces adding premium detailing
• Low-top silhouette ideal for casual everyday wear
• Reinforced stitching for enhanced durability
• Classic court-inspired design with modern comfort features
• Lightweight construction for easy movement

banner_details:
This banner features a clean and modern layout for promoting a sneaker product. It uses a neatly divided background with warm beige and taupe tones, layered with soft geometric shapes including rectangles and circles for depth and visual interest. The main heading (`heading`) is bold and eye-catching, placed on upper left over a circular shade. Below the heading, the subtitle (`tagline`) provides the brand message in slightly smaller bold font. A stacked feature list (`description`) highlights key product attributes in bullet points. The central focus is the shoe (`product_image`), balanced by the price tag (`price`) placed prominently at the bottom left. Adjacent to it is a call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with a contrasting label (`cta`) urging users to “Shop Now.”

**Color Palette:**
- Background Beige: #F2EDE4
- Secondary Beige: #E0D6C5
- Accent Beige: #E8DFD0
- Dark Brown (Text & Button): #6C4A32
- Light Brown (Button Background): #8B6E4F
- Highlight White (Text in CTA): #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a minimalistic yet stylish sneaker with an earthy, neutral color palette. Dominant cream beige (#F5F0E6) covers the upper canvas, exuding an understated, natural elegance. Accents of chocolate brown (#5A3E2B) are used for the laces, outsole, and stitching, adding depth and contrast. A crisp white (#FFFFFF) star logo outlined in brown further highlights the branding, making it the focal point. The midsole uses a soft taupe (#D8CBB8), providing a smooth transition from upper to sole. These tones blend harmoniously while maintaining distinct separations, ideal for a clean, sophisticated advertisement banner that emphasizes comfort and simplicity.
